articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Overseas Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a letter from the members of delegations of overseas Koreans who took part in the memorial service marking the first anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that they paid high respects to Kim Jong Il during the memorial service and keenly realized once again that the Korean nation lived a proud and dignified life under the warm care of the great leader, the sun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il represents the eternal leader and symbol of the great Paektusan nation whom the army and people of the DPRK and all other Koreans follow and worship generation after generation for his immense feats, the letter said.
					
					 Looking up to the beaming image of Marshal Kim Jong Un full of strong grit, they enshrined the truth that only the sun can glorify the cause of the sun and that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il will live in the hearts of the Koreans for all ages, the letter added.
					
					 They in the letter vowed to follow and defend Kim Jong Un by upholding him with single mind and believe in him as in Heaven no matter how many times the world may change, true to the pledge they made before the bier of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They vowed to work heart and soul for building a thriving nation of Kim Jong Il and realizing the patriotic cause of achieving the national reunification, the desire of the nation, with the pride of being overseas Koreans of Songun Korea which is heading toward the final victory in building a thriving socialist nation.
